title: Midnight at Orchard
synopsis:
In a family-run hotel, Eli is a burnt-out paramedic who thinks life can be managed with lists and late nights. When a small mistake snowballs into a public problem, Eli gets one chance to set it right—and to restore a lost work of art.

To do it, Eli teams up with an unlikely ally whose style is the opposite of careful planning. Together they follow a trail of messages, favors, and half-remembered stories that pull them through street corners, back rooms, and unexpected kindness. The deeper they go, the more they face a secret history buried in public records, and the more their initial assumptions about what ‘success’ means begin to crack.

As the deadline closes in, a final reveal changes the shape of the mystery: the confidant has been writing the narrative for their own reasons. Eli must choose between a neat ending and a brave one, learning to ask for help and to trust their own instincts. With drama warmth and music momentum, "Midnight at Orchard" lands on a hopeful note that lingers after the credits.

In a tech startup incubator, Cal is a reformed con artist who thinks life can be managed with lists and late nights. When a small mistake snowballs into a public problem, Cal gets one chance to set it right—and to solve a decades-old disappearance.

To do it, Cal teams up with an unlikely ally whose style is the opposite of careful planning. Together they follow a trail of messages, favors, and half-remembered stories that pull them through street corners, back rooms, and unexpected kindness. The deeper they go, the more they face a secret history buried in public records, and the more their initial assumptions about what ‘success’ means begin to crack.

As the deadline closes in, a final reveal changes the shape of the mystery: the confidant has been writing the narrative for their own reasons. Cal must choose between a neat ending and a brave one, learning to ask for help and to trust their own instincts. With sci-fi warmth and adventure momentum, "Quiet Signals" lands on a hopeful note that lingers after the credits.

title: Orchard After Winter
synopsis:
In a remote island, Lin is a street musician who thinks life can be managed with lists and late nights. When a small mistake snowballs into a public problem, Lin gets one chance to set it right—and to clear a loved one’s name.

To do it, Lin teams up with an unlikely ally whose style is the opposite of careful planning. Together they follow a trail of messages, favors, and half-remembered stories that pull them through street corners, back rooms, and unexpected kindness. The deeper they go, the more they face a mistaken identity that spirals, and the more their initial assumptions about what ‘success’ means begin to crack.

As the deadline closes in, a final reveal changes the shape of the mystery: the final obstacle becomes an unexpected act of kindness. Lin must choose between a neat ending and a brave one, learning to ask for help and to trust their own instincts. With sci-fi warmth and adventure momentum, "Orchard After Winter" lands on a hopeful note that lingers after the credits.
